title: What is the sequence of chapters taught in the mega phase of Vibrant Academy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mathematics- FunctionsInverse Trigonometric FunctionsVectors + 3D Geometry and Matrices+Binomial Theorem run in parallel classes.LimitContinuity & DifferentiabilityMethod of DifferentiationIndefinite IntegrationDefinite IntegrationApplications of Derivatives (T&N, Monotonocity, Max&Min)Differential EquationsProbability and Area Under Curve run in parallel classes.Complex NumbersConic Sections (Parabola, Hyperbola, Ellipse)Physics- String WavesSound Waves and Geometrical Optics run in parallel classes.Wave OpticsElectrostaticsGravitationCurrent ElectricityCapacitanceMagnetic Effects of CurrentElectromagnetic InductionAlternating CurrentModern PhysicsErrorOrganic Chemistry IsomerismBasic Organic Chemistry (BOC)Alkyl HalideGrignard’s ReagentHeating Effects of Carboxylic AcidsCarbonyl CompoundsAlcohols & EthersPractical Organic ChemistryCarbene & NitreneBiomoleculesPolymersAromatic CompoundsPhysical Chemistry RedoxChemical Kinetics & RadioactivityThermodynamicsElectrochemistryLiquid SolutionSolid StateSurface ChemistryInorganic Chemistry Chemical Bonding (12th portion)Coordination CompoundsMetallurgyQualitative Analysis (Salt Analysis & Types of Reactions)s-Blockd-Block & f-Blockp-BlockNote that this answer was with respect to the sequence of chapters that were taught to the L1 batch of Mega Phase in 2018–19. It might vary for other batches.
